title: Jordan Peterson Jonathan Pageau Commentary Pt. 1
description:
Mary K called me a FURRY tease, so I'll drip some of this stuff out as I go. 

This is the second part of https://youtu.be/8T0YQ0Jm6y0

I'll probably combine them and release them tomorrow morning along with what I don't get a chance to release tonight. 

Rationality Rules JBP Jesus Smuggling https://youtu.be/on0Lziov00Y
@Jordan B Peterson and @Jonathan Pageau now online! https://youtu.be/2rAqVmZwqZM
